website_description: Showcase of my skills, projects, and services as a freelance web developer.

pages.page_description: Welcome to my portfolio where I showcase my web development skills and projects.

sections.section_description: The top navigation header for the website, linking to different sections.
sections.section_prompt: Standard navbar with links to Home, About, Services, Blog, and Contact.

sections.section_description: A visually striking introductory section to capture visitors attention.
sections.section_prompt: Full-width hero image with an introductory tagline and a brief description overlay.

sections.section_description: A preview of my most recent blog entries about web development.
sections.section_prompt: A card layout showcasing titles and excerpts from the latest blog posts.

sections.section_description: Encouragement for visitors to reach out for collaboration.
sections.section_prompt: A prominent section with a button leading to the contact page, inviting visitors to connect.

sections.section_description: The bottom section containing links and copyright information.
sections.section_prompt: Footer with links to social media, copyright information, and additional navigation.
